description: Project created for the final of the frontend course, where I was able to put TypeScript into practice for the first time and the tools mentioned below, which, except for React, were all new to me

description: Project created for the final assignment in the frontend course, using React to build the interface of a dental clinic. It allows favoriting items, toggling the global state between light and dark mode, and viewing detailed information on the cards.
toolsUsed: JavaScript, React, react-router-dom, HTML, CSS, react-context

description: PetPlace is the final group project for the 'Certified Tech Developer' course, where, following Scrum framework dynamics, we developed a pet lodging booking website from scratch. I was involved specifically in the frontend aspect of the project.
toolsUsed: React, HTML, CSS, Yup, MUI, FontAwesome, SweetAlert, React-Calendar, React-Icons, react-router-dom

description: It's my personal project to show my projects, educational background, and contact information in a simple and clear manner for potential selection processes. The goal is to continuously improve it by adding more projects over time.
Transactional app created as part of the practical project in the Makaia's backend Bootcamp
toolsUsed: Java, Spring Boot, JWT, Spring MVC, Maven, H2 Database and MySQL, Lombok, Spring Boot Starter Data JPA and Spring Boot Starter Web, JUnit Jupiter, Spring Boot Test
